name: V nekotorom tsarstve
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
For the most ardent fans of platformers, we present the game "V nekotorom tsarstve". Your character - a monster unprecedented, which is going to go there, I do not know where and find something, I do not know what.

Character management develops coordination of movements and reaction, as it is necessary to move from platform to platform, while not falling into the abyss and not falling into the clutches of other monsters hostile.

This game can be useful not only for adults, but for children.

Features:
-achievements;
- Pleasant graphics;
-simple management;
-interesting gameplay;
- light music;
- unforgettable adventures;
- availability in 2 languages;
